admin.footer.support_prompt: Spot an issue or have feedback? Let the team know.
admin.feedback.modal.title: Send Feedback
admin.feedback.modal.description: Share bugs or improvement ideas with the product team. Include repro steps and impact when possible.
admin.feedback.modal.summary.label: Summary
admin.feedback.modal.summary.placeholder: e.g. Notes on order detail page do not persist
admin.feedback.modal.details.label: Details
admin.feedback.modal.details.placeholder: Describe the steps you took, what you expected, and what actually happened.
admin.feedback.modal.expectation.label: Expected outcome
admin.feedback.modal.expectation.placeho: e.g. Save button should show success toast and keep my input
admin.feedback.modal.console.label: Console log
admin.feedback.modal.console.placeholder: Paste relevant console errors or warnings (optional).
admin.feedback.modal.contact.label: Contact email
admin.feedback.modal.contact.help: We'll use this email to follow up on the investigation.
admin.feedback.modal.context.note: These values are attached automatically. Override them if you need to report another environment.
admin.feedback.modal.tracker_hint: You can also file an issue directly. For sev-1 incidents please ping #ops-bugs in Slack.
admin.feedback.modal.success.body: Thanks for the report! The product operations team has started triage.
admin.feedback.modal.error.contact_requi: Add a contact email so we can follow up.
admin.feedback.modal.error.fix_fields: Review the highlighted fields and try again.
admin.feedback.modal.error.submit_failed: We couldn't send your report. Please try again in a moment.
admin.topbar.language.label: Language
